name: strong-jaw

effect.sun_moon: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.

effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.

short_effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon’s strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
